plugins.name: coding-skills
plugins.description: 9 foundational coding principle skills for AI agents: KISS, DRY, SOLID, YAGNI, Separation of Concerns, Law of Demeter, Boy Scout Rule, Convention over Configuration, plus stack detection. Language-agnostic principles that help agents ship production-quality code.
